Ad Text:
Are you an experienced Microsoft Certified Senior Data Engineer with expertise in cloud-based data solutions? We’re working with a company in the finance sector in Brisbane that is seeking a skilled professional with strong knowledge of Azure Data Factory to join their growing data team.

6 month contract initially - possibility of extension.

2 days in the office

Key Responsibilities:
•    Design, build, and maintain scalable data pipelines using Azure Data Factory (ADF)
•    Implement CI/CD pipelines and automation using Azure DevOps
•    Collaborate with data analysts, architects, and finance stakeholders to develop high-quality, reliable data solutions
•    Ensure data quality, performance, and security across all data integration processes
•    Contribute to cloud data architecture and integration strategies across the finance domain

What We're Looking For:
•    Proven experience with Azure Data Factory and Azure DevOps
•    Strong SQL skills and experience with ETL/ELT development
•    Experience with other Azure services such as Data Lake, Synapse, and Azure SQL
•    Background in finance or other regulated environments preferred
•    Understanding of cloud-based data architecture and modern data engineering practices
•    Strong problem-solving and collaboration skills


Bonus Skills:
•    Familiarity with data governance and compliance best practices
•    Experience with reporting/visualisation tools like Power BI
•    Knowledge of infrastructure-as-code and automation in Azure environments

Why Apply?
•    Be part of a large Data Modernization project in the finance sector - this will look good on your CV!
•    Work with modern Azure technologies in a collaborative team
•    Flexible working arrangements (Brisbane-based is preferred)



Please APPLY today, interviews next week!

Or for more information please text Anna-Maria on 0426 503 822 and I will get back to you.
